Why Computer Science?

I fell in love with the world of computers from a very early age, because of my passion for mathematics and learning new things. Once I got to college, I began studying Computer Science and developed new passion for programming. I loves puzzles and programming is pretty much puzzle-solving paired with creating something new, being creative. I like the satisfaction I get from watching the computer in live do things that I pre-determined it.

Some of my favorite college courses:

  • Database Systems.
  • Data Structures.
  • Distributed Systems.
